description: North Korean authorities ordered hospital workers to stay silent about patients who died of Covid-19
type_sub_cat: NA
type_text: This policy can not be classified as Anti-Disinformation measure because it is not based on science. Patients showed symptoms of Covid-19 and died, and it appears that the North Korean authorities do not want to population to know that this is happening.
